page.title: 11My hobbies - ferreting
page.content: My favourite hobbies are ferreting, fishing and beating. What you need for ferreting are some nets made out of a special string and my Dad showed me how to make them. You need a bobbin, string and some copper rings. We have three ferrets and we feed them with dead chickens and tripe. We are lucky because we live in the country and we know a farmer who lets us go ferreting on his fields and along his hedges. When we find some burrows we put the nets over the holes and we put the ferrets down one of the holes and we wait for the rabbits to bolt. When they bolt they get caught in the net. It is not an expensive hobby.
